# Teaching

```{r Teaching}
data <- rbind(
  
  tibble(
    what = "PSY5610 - La psychologie des attitudes",
    when = "Winter 2019",

    where = "Montréal, Québec, Canada",
    details = "Undergraduate university class (38 students)")

}
```
